nodes.text: Dark Lady of the Sith Lumiya secretly commandeered a second apartment in the Zorp House complex of Coruscant's Galactic City during the Second Galactic Civil War. Located on the two hundred eighty-eighth floor, the infiltrated quarters served as a relay station for her datapad, which was installed and programmed to intercept various communications, as well as intelligence files from the Galactic Alliance Defense Force.
